name: João Gabriel de Medeiros Pereira
introduction: I'm a software developer with over 10 years of experience, specialized in iOS development with Swift and related technologies. I hold a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and have worked in financial and fintech companies creating reusable and collaborative solutions. I enjoy helping other developers, leading technical discussions, and finding ways to make development easier.

positions.role: Staff iOS Developer – Design System Team
responsabilities: Responsible for building the new Design System (DS) from scratch, from conception to production.
Created a dependency inversion structure to ensure safe and controlled use of DS resources.
Developed guardrails using Go, TypeScript, and Ruby to guide proper DS implementation.
Built scripts and dashboards to monitor DS adoption and usage across teams.

positions.role: Staff iOS Developer – Loan Business Unit
responsabilities: Cross-functional support in the Loan BU, assisting multiple squads with architecture, documentation, and pair programming.
Developed a DSL framework using ResultBuilder to standardize actions, analytics, and feedbacks.
Created the Feedback Framework for dynamic user messaging without needing app updates.
Developed SampleKit, an example module to speed up testing and reuse common logic.
Participated in the Buddy program, mentoring and supporting iOS developers.
Worked on modernization and maintenance of the card customization feature.
Implemented features for issuing and importing digital certificates.
Integrated In-App Purchase for certificate usage rights.
Created scripts and templates to streamline development of new features.
Integrated push notifications.
Developed Timeline (post-sales chat flow) features.
Refactored Timeline from Objective-C to Swift using MVVM architecture.
Migrated legacy Objective-C screens to Swift.
Developed two clothing sales apps (wholesale and retail).
Used MVVM architecture.
Integrated native functionalities of iOS and Android.
Developed the Investments screen with detailed information per asset.
Created a Banner Framework for marketing campaigns.
Integrated multiple modules in the main application.
Evaluated new product development and monitored code quality.
Maintained and ensured stability of apps like Itaú PF, Itaucard, Itaú Empresas, and ITI.
Worked on global project with Santander Spain.
Developed Apple Watch components.
Created a security framework.
Evaluated new products and monitored development quality.
Worked on new products for Itaú Bank.
Ensured code quality.
Developed and maintained the Santander app.
Developed multiple apps using Objective-C.
